entries.abort: Your commanding officer will hear about this!
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are at the right location. The shuttle should be here in a few seconds.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: The shuttle is safe, good job pilot!
entries.failed_destroy: No! We lost contact with them, get out of there!
entries.failed_protect: I can't make it on my own! Performing emergency hyperspace jump, may the force be with us...
entries.found_loc: Move on to the designated meeting coordinates.
entries.goodbye_1: Alright, we are jumping to hyperspeed. Great work pilot, we couldn't have made it out of there without you.
entries.goodbye_2: Alright, we are jumping to hyperspeed. Great work pilot, we couldn't have made it out of there without you.
entries.goodbye_3: Alright, we are jumping to hyperspeed. Great work pilot, we couldn't have made it out of there without you.
entries.goodbye_4: Alright, we are jumping to hyperspeed. Great work pilot, we couldn't have made it out of there without you.
entries.goodbye_5: Alright, we are jumping to hyperspeed. Great work pilot, we couldn't have made it out of there without you.
entries.hull_half: Our ship is falling apart pilot, we need help quickly!
entries.panic_1: Ack! Imperial patrol, they spotted us!
entries.panic_2: TIE ships, hot on our tail!
entries.panic_4: All these TIE-Fighters for just this one woman, she has to be important.
entries.panic_5: Bah! An Imperial patrol closing in!
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter and its precious cargo safely out of the Yavin system. Stay close and stay alert!
entries.quest_location_d: The Yavin system is crawling with Imperial fighters and they have put up a blockade around the moon of Yavin 4. You will without a doubt be kept busy so be ready for a fight!
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The Rebel freighter will stay hidden until you arrive at this location.
entries.reason_1: Good to see you pilot. Apparently this lady is really important so stay sharp.
entries.reason_2: Good to see you pilot. Apparently this lady is really important so stay sharp.
entries.reason_3: Good to see you pilot. Apparently this lady is really important so stay sharp.
entries.reason_4: Good to see you pilot. Apparently this lady is really important so stay sharp.
entries.reason_5: Good to see you pilot. Apparently this lady is really important so stay sharp.
entries.shields_depleted: We just lost our shields! Hang on Lady, it's going to get bumpy!
entries.taunt_1: We have the highest authority of the Imperial Inquisition to destroy them, no mercy guys!
entries.taunt_2: You are not going anywhere, foolish Rebels!
entries.taunt_4: The might of the Empire is unstoppable, puny Rebels!
entries.taunt_5: This is the last day of your life, foolish Rebels!
entries.thanks_1: You okay M'Lady? We're fine over here pilot, great work out there!
entries.thanks_3: Whow! Did you see that M'Lady? Those TIE's won't bother us again!
entries.thanks_4: Great job pilot! Hopefully they didn't call for backup.
entries.thanks_5: More of the Emperors drones turned in to space junk, nice going pilot!
entries.title: Yavin system: Escort important person out of the Yavin system.
entries.title_d: You are ordered to provide escort for a freighter trying to get through the Imperial blockade around Yavin 4. The lady being transported is apparently extremely important to the Alliance and can not be harmed or captured by the Empire. We are counting on you pilot!
